common_1100_rival_01: Aaand made it to station number three![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_rival_02:
How we doing after all that walking and battling
and whatnot? Anyone need a rest?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_botan_02: Hm? Oh, no, it’s not that.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_botan_03:
I’ve just been thinking ever since the professor
mentioned that time machine...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_botan_04a:
The Pokémon here in Area Zero came to our
time from the past, right?\c
So what about Koraidon? Isn’t it pretty likely
that it’s also one of those ancient Pokémon?[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_botan_04b:
The Pokémon here in Area Zero came to our
time from the future, right?\c
So what about Miraidon? Isn’t it pretty likely
that it’s also one of those future Pokémon?[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_rival_05a:
I think you’re onto something! It is kinda giving
off ancient vibes. Even its name sounds...past-y![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_rival_05b:
I think you’re onto something! It is kinda giving
off future vibes. Even its name sounds...future-y![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_rival_06: Wait a sec—I totally forgot! Hey, Arven![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_rival_07:
You had [VAR PKNAME(0001)]’s ball! And you told us about
its forms in the first place!\c
You must know something about it, right?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_friend_01:
Urk. You still remember that from way back?
No wonder you’re everybody’s little star pupil.\c
Guess I’ve got no choice, then, but to tell you
what I know...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_friend_02a:
It was found by my mom when she was working
on her time machine.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_friend_02b:
It was found by my dad when he was working on
his time machine.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_hakase_02a:
I believe it would be best for me to take over
the explanations at this point.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_02b:
I believe it would be best for me to take over
the explanations at this point.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_hakase_03a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Koraidon, which I entrusted to
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]...[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_03b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Miraidon, which I entrusted to
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]...[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_hakase_04a:
was the first Pokémon that was successfully
retrieved from the past by the time machine.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_04b:
was the first Pokémon that was successfully
retrieved from the future by the time machine.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_hakase_05a:
Through analysis of its genetic makeup, as well as
its behavioral patterns...[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_05b:
Through analysis of its genetic makeup, as well as
its behavioral patterns...[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_hakase_06a:
I came to realize that what I had discovered
was in fact an ancient form of Cyclizar, the\r
Pokémon still commonly ridden in this region.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_06b:
I came to realize that what I had discovered
was in fact a futuristic form of Cyclizar, the\r
Pokémon commonly ridden in this region.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_botan_09:
Well, that makes sense, I guess... They do
look alike.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_hakase_07a:
Many other Pokémon also came to this place
from across the boundaries of time.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_07b:
Many other Pokémon also came to this place
from across the boundaries of time.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_hakase_08a:
But I was never able to bring over more than two
specimens of [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_08b:
But I was never able to bring over more than two
specimens of [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_friend_16:
Huh? You mean...there’s another one around
here somewhere?![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_rival_15:
What if they’re family?! The other one could still
be somewhere in Area Zero, waiting to finally\r
be reunited with our [VAR PKNAME(0001)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_rival_16:
Exactly! Imagine how thrilled they’ll be if we can
get the family back together after all this time![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_friend_18: Family, huh... Yeah... That sounds nice.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_hakase_09a:
If we could proceed, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?\c
Please disable the next lock using the central
panel there.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1100_hakase_09b:
If we could proceed, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?\c
Please disable the next lock using the central
panel there.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1100_rival_17:
You can leave any wild Pokémon up to me!
I’ll have ’em beat in no time so we can march on![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1100_friend_17:
If that other Pokémon really is the only family
it has left in the world...\c
It must want to be together again, right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1100_botan_11:
These plot twists really tug at the heartstrings,
don’t they? Not that I’m complaining.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_stopper_01:
If you’re not gonna bother with the lock, mind
if I take apart that panel to see what’s inside?[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1100_stopper_out:
Um, isn’t that one of those research stations?
I thought we were supposed to disable the locks.[VAR 0114(0008)]
